bin/delta-print.c

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 /**********************************************************doxygen*//** @file
00002  * @brief   Prints cost matrix for delta feasibility problem.
00003  *
00004  * Prints cost matrix for delta feasibility problem.  For use for verifying
00005  * problem optimality with Concorde.
00006  *
00007  * @author  John LaRusic
00008  * @ingroup bin
00009  ****************************************************************************/
00010 #include "common.h"
00011 #include "btsp.h"
00012 
00013 /* Global variables */
00014 char *program_name;             /**< Program name */
00015 char *input_file = NULL;        /**< Given input TSPLIB file */
00016 int delta = 0;                  /**< Delta value */
00017 int solve_mstsp = ARROW_FALSE;
00018 int deep_copy = ARROW_FALSE;
00019 int edge_infinity = -1;
00020 
00021 /* Program options */
00022 #define NUM_OPTS 5
00023 arrow_option options[NUM_OPTS] = 
00024 {
00025     {'i', "input", "TSPLIB input file", 
00026         ARROW_OPTION_STRING, &input_file, ARROW_TRUE, ARROW_TRUE},
00027     {'d', "delta", "Delta value", 
00028         ARROW_OPTION_INT, &delta, ARROW_TRUE, ARROW_TRUE},
00029     {'m', "solve-mstsp", "solves maximum scatter TSP",
00030         ARROW_OPTION_INT, &solve_mstsp, ARROW_FALSE, ARROW_FALSE},
00031     {'D', "deep-copy", "stores data in full cost-matrix",
00032         ARROW_OPTION_INT, &deep_copy, ARROW_FALSE, ARROW_FALSE},
00033     {'I', "infinity", "value to use as infinity",
00034         ARROW_OPTION_INT, &edge_infinity, ARROW_FALSE, ARROW_TRUE},        
00035 };
00036 char *desc = "Prints cost matrix for delta feasibility problem";
00037 char *usage = "-i tsplib.tsp -d #";
00038 
00039 /* Main Method */
00040 int 
00041 main(int argc, char *argv[])
00042 {   
00043     int ret = EXIT_SUCCESS;
00044     //int stdout_id;
00045     int max_cost = INT_MAX;
00046     char comment[100];
00047     arrow_problem *problem;
00048     arrow_problem input_problem;
00049     arrow_problem mstsp_problem;
00050     arrow_problem asym_problem;
00051     arrow_problem delta_problem;
00052     arrow_btsp_fun fun_basic;
00053     
00054     /* Read program arguments */
00055     if(!arrow_options_parse(NUM_OPTS, options, desc, usage, argc, argv, NULL))
00056         return EXIT_FAILURE;
00057     
00058     /* Try and read the problem file */    
00059     if(!arrow_problem_read(input_file, &input_problem))
00060         return EXIT_FAILURE;
00061     problem = &input_problem;
00062     
00063     /* If we want to solve maximum scatter TSP, create BTSP equivalent. */
00064     if(solve_mstsp)
00065     {
00066         printf("Transforming MSTSP instance into equivalent BTSP instance.\n");
00067         max_cost = arrow_problem_max_cost(problem);
00068         if(!arrow_problem_mstsp_to_btsp(deep_copy, problem, max_cost, &mstsp_problem))
00069         {
00070             arrow_print_error("Could not create MSTSP->BTSP transformation.");
00071             return EXIT_FAILURE;
00072         }
00073         problem = &mstsp_problem;
00074         delta = max_cost - delta;
00075     }
00076     
00077     /* Calculate the value for "infinity" if necessary */
00078     if(edge_infinity < 0)
00079         edge_infinity = arrow_problem_max_cost(problem) + 1;
00080        
00081     if(problem->symmetric)
00082     {
00083         if(arrow_btsp_fun_basic(ARROW_FALSE, &fun_basic) != ARROW_SUCCESS)
00084             return EXIT_FAILURE;
00085     }
00086     else
00087     {
00088         if(!arrow_problem_abtsp_to_sbtsp(ARROW_FALSE, problem, edge_infinity, &asym_problem))
00089             return EXIT_FAILURE;
00090         if(!arrow_btsp_fun_asym_shift(ARROW_FALSE, edge_infinity, &fun_basic))
00091             return EXIT_FAILURE;
00092         problem = &asym_problem;
00093     }
00094 
00095     /* Apply function! */
00096     if(!arrow_btsp_fun_apply(&fun_basic, problem, INT_MIN, delta, &delta_problem))
00097     {
00098         arrow_print_error("Could not apply function to problem.\n");
00099         return EXIT_FAILURE;
00100     }
00101     
00102     /* Restore output */
00103     //arrow_util_restore_stdout(stdout_id);
00104     
00105     /* Generate comment */
00106     if(solve_mstsp)
00107         sprintf(comment, "Delta is %d, Infinity is %d, Original Max Cost %d", delta, 
00108                 edge_infinity, max_cost);
00109     else
00110         sprintf(comment, "Delta is %d, Infinity is %d", delta, edge_infinity);
00111         
00112     /* Print problem file out */
00113     arrow_util_write_problem(&delta_problem, comment, stdout);
00114     
00115     /* Free up the structure */
00116     arrow_problem_destruct(&delta_problem);
00117     arrow_btsp_fun_destruct(&fun_basic);
00118     if(!input_problem.symmetric)
00119         arrow_problem_destruct(&asym_problem);
00120     if(solve_mstsp)
00121         arrow_problem_destruct(&mstsp_problem);
00122     arrow_problem_destruct(&input_problem);
00123     return ret;
00124 }
